fixes.name: Status Selector
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced [Status] with 'Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[Status] and translated [Parameters].[Status Selector] to SELECTEDVALUE('Status Selector'[Display As]). The expression returns TRUE when the row Status equals the selected parameter value.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
